description: This file contains CSS styles and variables for managing themes and layout for the Bikers Heaven bike catalogue application. It includes definitions for light and dark themes, as well as styles for various components such as headers, buttons, and grids.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main application container with center alignment and background color transitions.

classes.name: .bh-header
classes.description: Header component of the bike catalogue with specific styles for background, text color, and layout.

classes.name: .bike-grid
classes.description: Grid layout for displaying bike cards responsively.

classes.name: .bike-card
classes.description: Individual card component for displaying bike details with hover effects.

classes.name: .bike-image
classes.description: Styling for bike images within the card.

classes.name: .bike-details
classes.description: Container for details of each bike displayed on the card.

classes.name: .bh-footer
classes.description: Footer for the application with styling for text and alignment.
